subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Andy Greene’s goal with 4 minutes 56 seconds left snapped a tie and lifted the Devils to a 3-2 win over the Islanders in Newark on Wednesday night, keeping the Devils alive in the playoff race.
snippet: Andy Greene’s goal with 4 minutes 56 seconds left snapped a tie and lifted the Devils to a 3-2 win over the Islanders in Newark on Wednesday night, keeping the Devils alive in the playoff race.
